name: mw27
description:
1/1
4950x4950
2021.

I've become fascinated with the idea of 'vision'.
Take William Blake who as a boy had a vision. 
He saw angels in the trees of Peckham Rye. 
Why did this wonderful human experience such a thing? 
How did the angels appear?
Did William put them there or where they waiting for him to come along? 
Can abstraction, even amongst the negative spaces of a tree drawn against the sky become the access point to what you hope is there?
